title: PTA congratulates  Ayla Majid on becoming global President of ACCA
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 27 (APP):The Pakistan Telecommunication Authority (PTA) congratulates Ms. Ayla Majid, an esteemed board member, on her historic election as the Global President of the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants (ACCA).
Ayla’s achievement marks a momentous milestone as she becomes the first South Asian, Pakistani, and Muslim to lead the prestigious 120-year-old global body.
Her leadership and vision are a testament to her exceptional contributions to finance and governance, said a news release.
PTA extends its best wishes to Ayla as she embarks on this remarkable journey. We look forward to benefiting from her expertise and guidance in fostering growth and innovation in Pakistan’s telecom and digital sectors.
